sedris::seDRMSurfaceGeometry

sedris::seDRMSurfaceGeometry Class Reference

seDRMSurfaceGeometry wraps the DRM <Surface_Geometry> abstract class. More...

Detailed Description

seDRMSurfaceGeometry wraps the DRM <Surface_Geometry> abstract class.

Note:
This is an ABSTRACT DRM class.
Author:
Warren Macchi
Version:
Revision: 1.8
See also:
seDRMPrimitiveGeometry

Member Function Documentation

virtual SE_DRM_Class sedris::seDRMSurfaceGeometry::getClassType (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Gets the DRM class type this object can reference (mostly internal use).

Warning:
Don't confuse with getDRMClass(), which is dependent on the actual type held by this DRM class object reference (especially because this is an abstract DRM class).
Returns:
SE_CLS_DRM_SURFACE_GEOMETRY

Reimplemented from sedris::seDRMPrimitiveGeometry.

Reimplemented in sedris::seDRMEllipse, and sedris::seDRMPolygon.
